title: How to Make Invitations on Facebook

steps.headline: Once there, you will find a 'calendar' symbolizing an icon labelled 'Events.'
Click on a button which says "Create an Event."
Announce on the Event application, the agenda you would like all your friends to come to.
Type in the names of the people whom you would like to invite into the "Guest List."

text: Go to your 'Applications' box.  Once there, you will find a 'calendar' symbolizing an icon labelled 'Events.'  Click on a button which says "Create an Event."  Announce on the Event application, the agenda you would like all your friends to come to.  Type in the names of the people whom you would like to invite into the "Guest List."  Click "Send Invitations."
sentences: Once there, you will find a 'calendar' symbolizing an icon labelled 'Events.'
Click on a button which says "Create an Event."
Announce on the Event application, the agenda you would like all your friends to come to.
Type in the names of the people whom you would like to invite into the "Guest List."
